field.name: module_subtitle
field.label: Module sub title
field.description: Additional module title to be displayed under the main module title

field.name: module_float
field.label: Force float
field.description: You can force float the module inside the grid by setting the float direction and adding the specific width to module container. Note that this option applies only to modules inside the grid.

field.name: module_floatwidth
field.label: Force float width
field.description: Add forced float module width in px or percentage. Example;200px. Note that this option applies only to modules inside the grid.

field.name: module_icon_prefix
field.label: FA Icon Before title
field.description: This field will be automatically populated once you click on the icon you like. You can also start typing the icon name. The icon you are looking for will be placed on top of the list.

field.name: module_icon_suffix
field.label: FA Icon After title
field.description: This field will be automatically populated once you click on the icon you like. You can also start typing the icon name. The icon you are looking for will be placed on top of the list.

field.name: before_module
field.label: Content before the module
field.description: Additional content to be displayed before the module. Html is allowed.

field.name: after_module
field.label: Content after the module
field.description: Additional content to be displayed after the module. Html is allowed.
